directions: Heat a skillet over medium heat.  Add the Spam(tm) and cover; fry until browned, about 10 to 15 minutes.   Turn the heat to low; add the cabbage and water.  Cover and steam until the cabbage is crisp tender, about 5 to 7 minutes.  Remove the lid, and stir in the soy sauce and tomato (if using).  Season to taste with salt and pepper.
ingredients: 1 (12 ounce) container fully cooked luncheon meat (e.g. Spam), cubed
1 small head napa cabbage, cut into small pieces
2 tablespoons soy sauce, or to taste
title: Spam™ and Napa Cabbage
